Function set_input_from_arguments¶

  • Defined in File program_io.h

Function Documentation¶

void set_input_from_arguments(global_args_t &arg, input_parameters_t &in)

Set the input parameters with the data from the global arguments.

Parameters

  • arg: Stuct with command line arguments.

  • in: Struct where the input parameters will be stored.
